about.summary: With over 10 years of combined experience in Web Development and Designing, I have worked in the Digital Marketing and Information Technology domain
highlights: Skilled in developing GUI using HTML, CSS, JavaScript/JQuery, and responsive designs
Experience in Responsive Layouts and Bootstrap 3/4, LESS, and SCSS
Skilled in hand-coding, implementing code and troubleshooting a variety of web development problems
Improve accessibility of applications using markup integrated with backend technologies like PHP/.NET Environments

experience.summary: Currently working as Senior UI Developer, managing Wordpress site.

I have worked on several projects ranging from responsive layouts, CSS, HTML to developing newsletters and Marketing forms & mailers with notable clients like Airtel, WorldBook Online and Google (SEO developer).
Mainly worked on Facebook Application design and development.  Here I got to sharpen my skills at Photoshop.

experience.company: Bombay IT Solutions and Palsan Business Services
experience.summary: I was responsible for designing web templates in Photoshop and converting them in live HTML pages. Gradually I got myself working along with developers and embedding PHP codes.
